title: WATCH:  Alligator appears to take aim at children swimming in Texas lake
description: Frightening moments for families visiting Huntsville State Park in Texas as an alligator appeared to take aim at a group of children swimming in a lake.

title: Judge again finds DACA illegal but doesn't strike down existing protections
description: A federal judge ruled -- again -- that Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program, or DACA, is illegal, but he refrained from removing people from it

title: DeSantis' administration advises against COVID booster for people under 65
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis is advising against the use of the new COVID-19 booster for people under the age of 65, even as infections tick upward in the U.S.

title: Rep. Mary Peltola's husband dies in plane accident
description: Rep. Mary Peltola's, D-Alaska, office announced Wednesday that her husband died in a plane accident in Alaska.

title: Judge rules teachers union must end sickout strike
description: The Clark County School District and the Clark County Education Association will appear in court on Wednesday amid an ongoing contract dispute.

title: Convicted murderer's escape raises questions about county prison inspections
description: The Pennsylvania Department of Corrections regularly inspects county prisons, but state law does not require their two inspectors to check facilities for escape risk.

title: A school shooting in Louisiana left 1 dead, 2 hurt. Classes are canceled until Friday.
description: Classes are canceled at a Louisiana high school where a student was shot to death and two others were injured

title: FDA sends letters to CVS, Walgreens, other companies about unapproved eye products
description: The FDA sent warning letters to eight companies, including CVS and Walgreens, warning them against making or selling unapproved eye products.

title: El Chapo's wife released from US custody after completing 3-year prison sentence
description: The wife of Mexican drug kingpin Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman has been released from federal custody after completing a three-year sentence for helping him run his multibillion-dollar criminal empire

title: Governor reacts to backlash after suspending right to carry firearms in public
description: New Mexico Gov. Michelle Lujan Grisham told "GMA3" on Wednesday that she has the "courage" to take a stand against gun violence.

title: New York considers state work authorization for migrants
description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul is considering "unprecedented" legislation that would have the state issuing work authorization for asylum seekers.

title: Mitt Romney not seeking reelection to the Senate
description: Mitt Romney announced via video on Wednesday that he will not seek reelection to the Senate in 2024

title: Rep. Boebert escorted from Denver theater during 'Beetlejuice' show
description: Surveillance video shows U.S. Rep. Lauren Boebert and another guest being kicked out of a Sunday “Beetlejuice” show in Denver

title: Trader Joe's accused of pregnancy discrimination, retaliation in federal lawsuit
description: A former Trader Joe’s employee is accusing the grocery chain of pregnancy discrimination and retaliation in a federal suit filed in the ​​U.S. District Court in Brooklyn.

title: Hunter Biden sues former Trump aide Garrett Ziegler over infamous laptop
description: Attorneys for Hunter Biden on Wednesday filed suit against a former Trump White House aide over his alleged role in publishing emails and embarrassing images online.

title: U.S. Rep. Mary Peltola returns to Alaska following the death of her husband in an airplane crash
description: U.S. Rep. Mary Peltola’s office has announced that the congresswoman’s husband died in an airplane crash in Alaska

title: Extortion trial against Joran van der Sloot, suspect in Natalee Holloway disappearance, is delayed
description: A federal judge has agreed to delay Joran van der Sloot’s trial on extortion charges until later this year in order to give his defense more time to prepare

title: Coal mine collapses in northern Turkey, trapping miners
description: Officials say part of a coal mine has collapsed in northern Turkey, leaving one miner dead and injuring others

title: Flood death toll in eastern Libya reaches 5,300 with many more missing, officials say
description: The number of deaths is expected to continue rising as search and rescue teams recover more bodies in what the U.N. has described as a "calamity of epic proportions."

title: WATCH:  Danelo Cavalcante shown on video shortly after capture
description: Cavalcante, who escaped from a prison days after being sentenced to life without parole in the fatal stabbing of his ex-girlfriend, has been captured.

title: Escaped murderer Danelo Cavalcante captured following intense manhunt
description: Danelo Cavalcante, who escaped from a prison days after being sentenced to life without parole in the fatal stabbing of his ex-girlfriend, has been captured.

title: Colombian migrant father reunites with family after separation at US border
description: The Biden administration discontinued mandated separation, but for some families who arrive in Texas, it’s still happening, according to an immigration attorney.

title: American caver's partner speaks out about Mark Dickey's health after dramatic rescue
description: The partner of Mark Dickey, the American caver who was trapped thousands of feet underground in Turkey for 12 days, has spoken out about.

title: Inmate who escaped from a hospital found sleeping on friend's couch
description: A 44-year-old inmate who escaped from a New York City-area hospital last month was recaptured Tuesday morning.

title: Luxury cruise ship runs aground with 206 people on board as rescue efforts underway
description: A luxury cruise ship carrying 206 passengers has run aground off the coast of Greenland.

title: Rescue teams frustrated Morocco did not accept more international help after quake
description: Rescue teams in Europe are frustrated that Morocco did not throw open its doors to more outside assistance after last week's deadly earthquake

title: WATCH:  Aurora bursts with color in North Dakota sky
description: Mesmerizing aurora bursts with color in the star-filled North Dakota sky, glowing in beautiful hues of bright green and purple.

title: WATCH:  Kim Jong Un meets with Putin in Russia
description: North Korea's Kim Jong Un has arrived at the Vostochny Cosmodrome in Russia for his planned meeting with President Vladimir Putin.

title: Are prices still cooling? All eyes are on the latest inflation report
description: Fresh inflation data follows an uptick in July that reversed some progress in the fight to slow price hikes.

title: French agency says the iPhone 12 emits too much radiation, tells Apple to withdraw it
description: Corrective updates to the iPhone 12 will be monitored by the agency.

title: China's 'full-time children' move back in with parents,  as good jobs grow scarce
description: A record of more than one in five young Chinese are out of work.

title: Crimean shipyard on fire after Ukrainian attack, 2 ships damaged, 24 people injured
description: The Sevastopol Shipyard in Russian-annexed Crimea is on fire after a Ukrainian attack with 24 people being injured and two ships that were being repaired there sustaining damage

title: More than a dozen feared dead in massive fire at apartment building in Hanoi
description: Around a dozen people are feared dead after a massive fire broke out at an apartment building in Vietnam’s capital, Hanoi

title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un arrives for meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin
description: North Korea's Kim Jong Un has arrived at the Vostochny Cosmodrome for his planned meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: North Korea launches possible ballistic missile: Japan's Ministry of Defense
description: North Korea launched a possible ballistic missile on Wednesday, Japan's Ministry of Defense said in a tweet.

title: US poverty rate jumped in 2022, child poverty more than doubled: Census
description: The poverty rate in the United States increased last year, the first increase in 13 years, according to the Census Bureau.

title: Elderly man, 74, pushed onto NYC subway tracks in unprovoked attack: Police
description: An elderly man was shoved onto the New York City subway tracks in an unprovoked attack, police said.

title: WATCH:  Four humpback whales seen breaching together in incredible video
description: The stunning sight was captured by a family fishing 15 miles off Long Island, New York.
